Digital Marketing Meets Frontend Development

After 10-years working in digital marketing it was high time I learned some code.

    This project involved optimizing an existing web page by replacing image icons with SVG graphics and animating them where appropriate.

    Skills Required

    SVG, CSS3, CSS Animation

  • Working with APIs

    Using the Spotify and Open Library APIs, this webpage populates results in response to a album or book covers search. Clicking on search results open a lightbox that includes further information.

    Skills Required

    APIs, AJAX, JQuery, JSON, HTML5, CSS3

    Grade

    Exceeds Expectations

    Reviewer's Comments

    You've got all the advanced stuff implemented and it works great. I like the additions you made to easily move between the detail popups!

  • Custom Video Player

    This custom HTML5 video player was built using the HTML5 Video API. The video and transcript are sychronized so that when the transcript is clicked users are taken to the corresponding section of the video.

    Skills Required

    HTML5 Video API, JavaScript, JQuery, CSS3

    Grade

    Exceeds Expectations

    Reviewer's Comments

    Really awesome work on the transcript highlighting. The slow fill transition is a really clever implementation, and adds so much to the functionality. Love the detail you put into changing the UI for mobile sizes, and accounting for the fact that "hover" doesn't exist. Overall fantastic work on this project, Brendan!

  • Photo Gallery

    This photo gallery includes a search bar so that photos are shown or hidden depending on user input. The gallery includes a lightbox with navigation for moving to the next/previous photo.

    Skills Required

    JavaScript, JQuery, CSS3, HTML5

    Grade

    Exceeds Expectations

    Reviewer's Comments

    Great job! Congratulations on using all your own JavaScript to build out this project. No plugins here! You've built a great gallery and added all the features we asked.

  • Dashboard

    This project invovled building a responsive web dashboard with charts and graphs using Charts.js. It also required working with CSS flexbox for the layout and leveraging the browser's local storage to save user preferences.

    Skills Required

    Charts.js, Javascript, JQuery, CSS3, HTML5

    Grade

    Exceeds Expectations

    Reviewer's Comments

    Your Web App Dashboard project is terrific. Your widgets all look amazing. Great job implementing Charts.js and working with SVGs. Your site looks and functions beautifully. Your code and directory appear clean and well organized. Well done adding some extra features to your alert notification task. Smooth UI! Very cool! All in all, stellar work!

  • Page Speed Optimization

    By taking advantage of an automated workflow with Gulp, this project required improving a poorly optimized page by reduce the total load size to under 1MB and file requests to under 23.

    Skills Required

    Gulp, JavaScript, TinyPNG, npm, Sprites, gzip, minification

    Grade

    Exceeds Expectations

    Reviewer's Comments

    Holy smokes! Yours is the lowest number of file requests I've ever seen in this project! Awesome work! Your knowledge of workflow automation will make your life much easier as you move into more complicated frameworks and projects. Nice job pulling out all the stops on this one -- gzip, sprites, minification, gulp, etc.
